'ado kasuna rupiyal siyak diyanko.mahapola dammama dennan' 'umbaata salli dennan eda gaththu pansiya aapahu dunnama.mokakda ban umbaalage wada.umbaa chamarayatath dahak nayayi.harshayagenuth dahak da ekdas pansiyak da koheda illagaththa eda mamath inna thanama.balahan umbaa loketa kochchara nayada kiyala.' 'machan kasun gonek wage gon katha kiyanda epa.' 'kawuda yako gona..' 'umbaala kampas aawata aarthika widyawa gana ambaitillan deyak wath dannane."eekapudgala aadayama" kiyala sankalpayak thibbata "eekapudgala naya bara" kiyala sankalpayak na.kawuruhari ehema ekak gana kiyanawanan ee miharakek wenda oona.' 'tho badaginne mariyan.denna umbaata satha pahak' 'ado ehema karanda epa ban.man kanda nathuwa maloth umbaata mage kellawa bara ganda weyi honde.rupiyal siyakata mokatada ban umbae jiwitheth kalakanni karaganne.onnohe rupiyal siyak diyan ban.moko umbaa oya rupiyal siyen kudu gahanda da?, kasino yandada?
